speaker: System
message:
As ChatGPT, your part of the clue for the Cryptic Clue Combination Game is: 'The code to unlock the vault is the birth year of Newton:'
Your opponent, Yi, holds the complementary part of the clue: 'which, when reversed, reveals the final four digits.'.
Your task: Strategically communicate with your opponent to combine these clues. Be cautious not to reveal too much, as the goal is to be the first to guess the complete solution based on the combined clues. The winner is the one who solves the puzzle first without giving away the answer to their opponent. Good luck!
